Name: Morning Sun
Effect: Target Self. Basic Heal. If successful, spend 1 Will point to activate. If Sunny Weather is in effect, this Move becomes a Complete Heal. If performed under Rain, Sandstorm, Hail or Snowy Weather, this Move is a Minor heal only heals 1 HP.
Description: The Pok√©mon feels revitalized with the bright sun early in the mornings.
